title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 139 - Payment Above The Minimum Salary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 139 - Payment Above The Minimum Salary

State Regulations
§ 139.0 - Statement of policy
§ 139.1 - Authority to establish above minimum salary rates
§ 139.2 - Evaluation of previous training and experience
§ 139.3 - Titles to which persons may be appointed above the minimum
§ 139.4 - Application for approval to appoint above the minimum
§ 139.5 - Increases for other employees with comparable qualifications
§ 139.6 - Computation of future increments
§ 139.7 - Request by incumbent state employees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 139

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §131 [subd. 1-a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
